verses.1: Topa aw, ka galte tam mahmah a, mi tampi tak in kei hong langpan nainai uh hi.
verses.2: Pasian in amah huh lo ding, mi tampi in hong ci uh hi.
verses.3: Ahih hangin Topa aw, nang pen ka kidalna lum, ka minthanna le ka lu hong phong pa na hi hi.
verses.4: Nakpi takin Topa ka gal sap a, amah in a mual siangtho panin kei a hong dawng hi.
verses.5: Lumin ka ihmu a, Topa in hong kem ahih manin ka thokik hi.
verses.6: Keimah a hong galbawl keimah a hong umcih mi tul sawm tampite ka kihta kei hi.
verses.7: Tho in, Topa! Kei hong hon in, ka Pasian! Bang hang hiam cih leh ka galte khempeuhʼ paang nangmah in na beeng gawp a, migiloteʼ ha na sutan hi.
verses.8: Gualzawhna pen Topa nangma hang ahi hi. Na mite tungah na thupha hong tung tahen!
